pages.text: The $(c)Sanguine Scythe$() is the tool of a harvester. It treats the battlefield like a field of wheat, reaping the life force of all who stand before it.
Every soul claimed by this blade feeds the wielder. Upon killing a creature, you $(2)instantly recover$() a portion of your own $(4)Health (LP)$(), allowing you to fight indefinitely.

With a $(6)Sneak-Right-Click$(), the scythe unleashes a $(4)Blood Vortex$(). This swirling storm of gore pulls in nearby enemies and shreds them to pieces, turning the area into a crimson slaughterhouse.
